title: 时装工坊装备后死亡掉落怎么解决，求解！
author: 痴情乄
txt_content:
时装工坊装备后死亡掉落怎么解决，求解！（已设置死亡不掉落）
1.12.2   Catserver服务器
最新版mod

replies.author: YuiGabriel
replies.txt_content:
在config/armourersWorkshop/common.cfg
找到
    # Should skins be dropped on player death.
    # 0 = use keep inventory rule
    # 1 = never drop
    # 2 = always drop
    I:dropSkinsOnDeath=0
改成1就不会掉落了

replies.author: 痴情乄
replies.txt_content:
YuiGabriel 发表于 2019-12-14 17:38
在config/armourersWorkshop/common.cfg
找到
    # Should skins be dropped on player death.
谢谢。。。。。
